item.title: Bayesian moderation analysis
item.description: This post is the first of a series of short tutorials on how to approach statistical analyses common among social psychologist using Bayesian approach and R package - brms Moderation analysis is one the most widely used tools to approach interactions in regression models with at least 1 continuous term. Its popularity has outbursted since the release of an SPSS/SAS macro PROCESS. PROCESS is easy to use and allows to fit a variety of models.
